title: Condo 2 Bdrm 2 Bath 1 Car Garage
posting_body: Condo located at Mercy Bellbrook in a charming yet small complex.
A senior living community in a
quiet setting for those 62 years or older.
Unit includes 1 car attached garage and screened in porch off the back.
Freshly painted interior, new carpet and kitchen floor ready for move in.
12 month lease with option for term extension.
Renter will be given first opportunity to purchase unit including a land contract sale as an option.
Applicant required to submit to security background check, references and very good credit score.
Owner pays water/sewer, trash pickup, taxes, insurance (except renters insurance) and HOA dues.
Renter responsible for electric, gas, internet/cable and telephone service.
Close to downtown Rochester shopping, restaurants, hospitals and public services.
